channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bus sheltet, 11th January
item.description:
Brookmill Road( Elverson Road) Remove graffiti from bus shelter

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookmill Road, Deptford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Leak in Maple Road and drains are all blocked causing flooding, 11th January
item.description:
This leak has been ongoing for about a month. As the roads have not been cleaned for many months and the drains have not been cleared the water is running down the road. The water has now been flooding across the road and has been freezing overnight causing a hazard to both pedestrians and cars. This is an accident waiting to happen and needs to be sorted out ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jasmine Grove, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human forest bikes, 11th January
item.description:
There are bikes related to human forest parked on the pavement where it shouldn't be outside the Portman Square garden opposite to 43-45 Portman square.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43-45, Portman Square, Soho, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping & litter on former Working Men's club premises, 11th January
item.description:
There is continuous rubbish dumped and left in this area (formally Bomdatts) - the photos reflect current dumping of rubbish, litter and excess bins in the corners, alongside and in door entry of property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valley Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No litter picking in this part of Camberwell Rd, 11th January
item.description:
The section of Camberwell Rd between John Ruskin St and Grosvenor Terrace (in front of 26-44 Camberwell Rd) is never litter picked. The street cleaner who does the section north from John Ruskin St tells me it is not part of his patch. Is it anyone's? It is regularly in a disgusting condition.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grosvenor Terrace, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox found in garden, 11th January
item.description:
Dead fox found in garden. Thought it was sleeping but noticed this morning it hasn’t moved since yesterday. Triple bagged and left outside gate to street. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Grove Park Road, Mottingham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed bumps are dangerous, 11th January
item.description:
If a road is 20mph you should be allowed to drive in it at 20 mph. Just before Xmas I drove onto Lee Terrace in my fiesta, went over the speed bump and bang went the front on my vehicle and suspension, I was waiting for oil to piss out. These speed humps are illegal and I see the daily mail carried an article today about these same humps. You have broken the law because in order to go over these without breaking your car it’s 2mph. Fix the problem before we do.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Lee Terrace, Blackheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wavertree Road, Streatham Hill, Greater London

item.title: Wrecked car blocking entire footway and cycle path, 11th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watermead Way, Greater London
